title: PHPgetprotobynumber()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPgetprotobynumber()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
A getprotobynumber() example:
<?php
$protocolname = getprotobynumber(6);
echo $protocolname;
?>
Definition and Usage
The getprotobynumber() function returns the protocol name for a given protocol number.
Syntax
getprotobynumber(
protocolnumber
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
protocolnumber
Required. Specifies a protocol number (like 17)
Technical Details
Return Value:
The protocol name on success. FALSE on failure.
PHP Version:
4.0+

★
+1
